The 'Governor of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts' is the executive magistrate
of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, United States. The current Governor is
Democrat Deval Patrick. The next election will be 2014, which will select a new
governor as the incumbent Deval Patrick has stated that he will not seek re-
election after his current term.
